translation: The third major text, wanting to know, concludes with an exhortation to give rise to the mind. Here are three things.
The first half of the verse correctly encourages.
The next three and a half verses explain the reason for the exhortation.
It's because it summarizes all the virtues that are fully present.
The last verse concludes with an exhortation to quickly arouse it.

source_sentence: 大方廣佛華嚴經疏卷第十九
